languages.text: {n}Несколько секунд присутствующие негромко переговариваются, и, наконец, вам отвечает женщина средних лет с вычурно высокой прической.{/n} "Кажется, мы с сестрой видели его сидящим на одной из лавочек в стороне от входа во дворец... Кажется, он был в компании некоего господина, но, простите Ваша Светлость, лица его мы не разглядели".

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько секунд присутствующие негромко переговариваются, и наконец вам отвечает женщина средних лет с вычурно высокой прической.{/n} "Кажется, мы с сестрой видели его сидящим на одной из лавоче в стороне от входа во дворец... Кажется, он был в компании некоего господина, но, простите Ваша Светлость, лица его мы не разглядели".
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько секунд присутствующие негромко переговариваются, и, наконец, вам отвечает женщина средних лет с вычурно высокой прической.{/n} "Кажется, мы с сестрой видели его сидящим на одной из лавочек в стороне от входа во дворец... Кажется, он был в компании некоего господина, но, простите Ваша Светлость, лица его мы не разглядели".

traits.locale_text: {n}The gathered people talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairdo replies to you.{/n} I think that me and my sister have seen him sitting on the bench to the side of the palace's entrance... We think he had been accompanied by a man, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we could not make out his face."
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}貴族たちが静かに話し合う。それから、うずたかく飾り立てた髪型の中年女性があなたの問いに答える。{/n}「兄弟と私は、宮殿入り口から少し離れたベンチに腰かけていた彼を見かけました…紳士とご一緒だったようですが、申し訳ありません、陛下、その男性の顔はわかりません」
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族たちが静かに話し合う。それから、うずたかく飾り立てた髪型の中年女性があなたの問いに答える。{/n}「兄弟と私は、宮殿入り口から少し離れたベンチに腰かけていた彼を見かけました…紳士とご一緒だったようですが、申し訳ありません、陛下、その男性の顔はわかりません」
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}在场的贵族窃窃私语起来，随后，一名身材高挑、发型繁复的中年女士开了口。{/n}“我和妹妹今天似乎见到过他，他和另一位绅士正坐在距离宫殿入口不远处的长椅上……大人，请见谅，我们没有看清那人究竟是谁。”
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}人群窃窃交谈起来，随后，一名身材高挑、发型繁复的中年女士开了口。{/n}“我和妹妹今天似乎见到过他，他和另一位绅士正坐在距离宫殿入口不远处的长椅上……大人，请见谅，我们没有看清那人究竟是谁。”
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}Les différents nobles présents murmurent entre eux, puis une femme d'une quarantaine d'années à la coiffure extravagante vous répond :{/n}« Ma sœur et moi l'avons vu assis sur un banc non loin de l'entrée du palais... Il nous semble qu'il était accompagné d'un gentleman, mais, que Votre Seigneurie nous pardonne, nous n'avons pas pu distinguer son visage. »
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les différents nobles présents murmurent entre eux, puis une femme d'une quarantaine d'années à la coiffure extravagante vous répond :{/n} « Ma sœur et moi l'avons vu assis sur un banc non loin de l'entrée du palais... Il nous semble qu'il était accompagné d'un gentleman, mais, que Votre Seigneurie nous pardonne, nous n'avons pas pu distinguer son visage. »
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}Los nobles hablan en voz baja, y entonces, una mujer de mediana edad con un peinado alto y extravagante te responde:{/n} «Creo que mi hermana y yo le vimos sentado en un banco cerca de la entrada del palacio... Creemos que iba acompañado de un caballero, pero no conseguimos distinguir su rostro, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente habla en voz baja, y entonces, una mujer de mediana edad con un peinado alto y extravagante te responde:{/n} «Creo que mi hermana y yo le vimos sentado en un banco cerca de la entrada del palacio... Creemos que iba acompañado de un caballero, pero no conseguimos distinguir su rostro, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}Alle tuscheln leise untereinander, dann antwortet dir eine Frau mittleren Alters mit einer extravaganten toupierten Frisur.{/n} "Ich glaube, meine Schwester und ich haben ihn ein Stück vom Palasteingang entfernt auf einer Bank sitzen sehen ... Wir glauben, er war in Begleitung eines anderen Herren, doch wir konnten dessen Gesicht nicht ausmachen. Vergebt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle tuscheln leise untereinander, dann antwortet dir eine Frau mittleren Alters mit einer extravaganten toupierten Frisur.{/n} "Ich glaube, meine Schwester und ich haben ihn ein Stück vom Palasteingang entfernt auf einer Bank sitzen sehen ... Wir glauben, er war in Begleitung eines anderen Herren, doch wir konnten dessen Gesicht nicht ausmachen. Vergebt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog

languages.text: {n}Soylular kendi aralarında sessizce konuşuyor. Sonrasında saçları uzun ve şaşalı, orta yaşlı bir kadın öne çıkıp sorunu yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Sanırsam kardeşimle birlikte sarayın girişinden biraz ötedeki bir oturakta görmüştük... Yanlışımız yoksa yanında bir beyefendi vardı ama maalesef yüzünü seçemedik. Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles talk quietly among themselves, and then a middle-aged woman with a tall, extravagant hairstyle replies to you,{/n} "I think my sister and I saw him sitting on the bench some distance away from the palace's entrance... We think he was accompanied by a gentleman, but, forgive us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we could not make out his face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soylular kendi aralarında sessizce konuştuktan sonra uzun ve şaşalı saçları olan orta yaşlı bir kadın sorunu yanıtlıyor:{/n} "Sanırsam kardeşimle birlikte sarayın girişinden biraz ötedeki bir oturakta görmüştük onu... Yanlışımız yoksa yanında bir beyefendi vardı ama maalesef yüzünü göremedik. Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
traits.speaker: NobleInPalace_Drivesteam_FemaleForDialog
